Length	202
Function	Mitochondrial ribosome-associated protein involved in the first steps of cytochrome c oxidase complex (complex IV) biogenesis (PubMed:34969438). Stimulates the translation of MT-CO1 mRNA and is a constituent of early MT-CO1 assembly intermediates (PubMed:34969438).
Subcellular Location	Mitochondrion inner membrane
